Name: Javinizer
Overview: A commandline and GUI based PowerShell module used to scrape metadata and sort your local Japanese Adult Video (JAV) files into a media library compatible format

@attributes.Name: config
@attributes.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /config

@attributes.Name: logs
@attributes.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /logs

@attributes.Name: /mnt
@attributes.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /mnt

@attributes.Name: Port for GUI
@attributes.Description: Port used to access the application's GUI
